original_text: Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity; and falling headlong, he burst asunder in the midst, and all his bowels gushed out.
korean_text: (이 사람이 불의의 삯으로 밭을 사고 후에 몸이 곤두박질하여 배가 터져 창자가 다 흘러 나온지라

sentences.original_text: Now this man purchased a field
he burst asunder in the midst
and all his bowels gushed out
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 모든 내장이 쏟아져 나왔습니다
